txt.en: <rgb=#00FFFF>Tabî-kohin is vulnerable!</rgb>
'This pitiful village shall burn first, then we shall bring the Lonely Mountain down atop the earth-diggers!'
The Bells of Dale
'You have come too late, fools!'
'To arms, Jangovar! Burn this miserable village!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A shadow-rat is attempting to enter the bell-tower from the south-west and gnaw loose the bells...stop it!</rgb>
'You are too late, little worms! The Great Eye has turned upon the North!'
'Ah! A friendly face! A fortuitous meeting, to be sure!'
'A vast army of Easterlings calling themselves the Jangovar are approaching the eastern banks of the River Running.'
'I have sent most of my fighting men to form a defensive line on the western bank... we will hold them off as long as we can, but I need your help.'
'Help us!'
'A few Jangovar raiders have already broken into the city...defeat them, then proceed to the belltower and ring the bells. The people must be warned to retreat to Erebor!'
'Ah!'
<rgb=#FF00FF>Tabî-kohin is invulnerable!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadow-rats have gnawed loose another bell causing it to fall. If one more falls, you will fail!</rgb>
'Help! There are evil Men in the city!'
'Spirits of Shadow, aid me!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A shadow-rat is attempting to enter the bell-tower from the south-east and gnaw loose the bells...stop it!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadow-rats have gnawed loose another bell causing it to fall. If four more fall, you will fail!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadow-rats have gnawed loose another bell causing it to fall. If three more fall, you will fail!</rgb>
'The bells of Dale will be destroyed, and the outlying villages will be unprepared for the vengeance of the Jangovar.'
'When the Dark Lord summoned us to battle, my master, Yetkeyin the Violet, forbade us to come....'
'But we knew it was a test... Yetkeyin is an emissary of the gods, and Sauron is chief of gods.'
'So in the name of Sauron and Yetkeyin, you shall perish, that our masters will know that we are loyal! Spirits of earth and fire, arise!'
'Spirits of the storm, wind and lightning, come to me!'
'Earth, fire, wind, and lightning... destroy these meddlers!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A shadow-rat is attempting to enter the bell-tower from the north-east and gnaw loose the bells...stop it!</rgb>
'Spirits of the winter, come to me!'
'Elements of nature... destroy these meddlers!'
'Yetkeyin, why have you betrayed us?'
<rgb=#FF0000>A shadow-rat is attempting to enter the bell-tower from the north-west and gnaw loose the bells...stop it!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadow-rats have gnawed loose one bell causing it to fall. If five more fall, you will fail!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadow-rats have gnawed loose six bells. You have failed!</rgb>
'Jangovar, to me!'
'Thank you for saving us!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadow-rats have gnawed loose another bell causing it to fall. If two more fall, you will fail!</rgb>
